articles.description: Max Verstappen took pole position for the 2022 Dutch Grand Prix with Charles Leclerc missing out by 0.021s in a thrilling Zandvoort contest.
articles.content:
Max Verstappen took pole position for the 2022 Dutch Grand Prix, with Charles Leclerc missing out by 0.021s in a thrilling Zandvoort contest.
